item.title: This month in hax: June 2024
item.description: This first blog post inaugurates our series named “This Month in hax”: a series of short highlights of what happened in the development of hax and it’s ecosystem in the month. In June, 30 PRs have been merged ðŸŽ‰! The detail is available below. On the Rust side, we have updated the Rust compiler to a very recent nightly thanks to @Nadrieril! We also added support for more Rust features in the frontend (dyn Trait), more disciminant informations on ADTs, fixed various bugs, and improved the general experience of using hax.
